templates.description: Bookstack is a free and open source Wiki designed for creating beautiful documentation. Featuring a simple, but powerful WYSIWYG editor it allows for teams to create detailed and useful documentation with ease.

env.description: Address to access Bookstack. If using a domain, add it here. If not set correctly the app will not be accessible
env.label: APP_URL
env.name: APP_URL

templates.name: bookstack
templates.note:
Template created by Deleven
Check my Github page: https://github.com/GSB-Deleven/HomeLab

Official Webpage: https://www.bookstackapp.com/
Official Docker Documentation: https://www.bookstackapp.com/docs/admin/installation/#docker


Default login is admin@admin.com with a password of password. The database created is called bookstackapp and the database user is called bookstack
templates.title: Bookstack
